MAIN_PAGE.CERTIFICATIONS: Bachelor of Computer Science | Pursuing an MBA in Data Science
MAIN_PAGE.SUMMARY:
I am primarily a front-end developer with additional experience in back-end development and databases. I am also in the process of learning the fundamentals of data science.

As a professional, my objective is to interact with a wide variety of technologies and tools in order to follow the curve of technological improvements, always searching for new techniques to improve my efficiency in carrying out the most varied tasks.
